    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BetException
    Custom exception thrown when a bet cannot be placed due to various reasons.
    Blackjack
    Blackjack game, child of Game.
    BlackjackUI
    Window where the Blackjack game is played.
    Client
    Represents a client (customer) in the casino system.
    ClientDAO
    DAO class for managing Client entities in the database.
    ClientEditUI
    Window for editing existing client data.
    ClientUI
    Window for adding new clients to the system.
    ConnectUI
    Window that allows the user to log in or create a profile.
    DataBaseConnector
    Handles the connection between the application and the MySQL database.
    DataBaseController
    Controller responsible for managing database operations across different DAOs (UserDAO, ClientDAO, GameDAO, GameSessionDAO).
    DatabaseManager
    Central manager class for database operations within the MVC architecture.
    ExceptionMessage
    Utility class to handle exceptions by displaying a user-friendly error message and logging technical details to the console.
    Game
    Abstract class representing a casino game.
    GameDAO
    DAO class for managing Game entities in the database.
    GameEditUI
    Window for editing existing game data.
    GameException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to open the games window without any existing user or game created beforehand.
    GameSessionDAO
    DAO class for managing game sessions in the database.
    GameUI
    Window for adding new games to the system.
    HomeUI
    Main menu window of the casino simulator.
    Launcher
    The Launcher class is the main entry point of the application.
    LogInUI
    Window where the user can log in to the application.
    MailException
    Exception thrown when an entered email is invalid or does not meet the expected format.
    MainController
    The central controller of the application, coordinating between the Model (game logic, clients, users) and the View (UI windows).
    ManagementUI
    Window for managing users (clients) and games.
    PlayUI
    Window for starting games.
    ProfileUI
    Window that displays information about the currently logged-in user.
    Session
    Manages user login sessions in the application.
    SignInUI
    Window that allows a user to create a new account and log in.
    Slotmachine
    Slotmachine game, child of Game.
    SlotmachineUI
    Window where the Slotmachine game is played.
    StatsUI
    Window displaying game statistics for a specific user.
    User
    Represents a user profile in the system.
    UserDAO
    DAO class for managing User in the database.
    Validator
    Class responsible for validating input and output data in the application.
    ViewController
    Controller responsible for managing the application's user interfaces (UIs).
